homePage.parrafo: View some of the available formats: Porous Network, Particles and Voronoi.

main.parrafo1: Views the available formats by reading data from a JSON file.
main.parrafo2: Having all the data in a json file makes it easy to read, and this format is well structured and easy to understand.
main.parrafo3: Obtaining results from your research and/or practice sometimes requires a visual interpretation to make it easier to understand.
main.parrafo4: It is not enough to just look at graphs of your data, visual interpretation is important.
main.parrafo5: If the format to be displayed allows it, graphs of some of your data can be observed.
main.parrafo6: Our particle format has this ability to view bar charts and pie charts.

banner.parrafo: UAM members can submit their results with the agreed JSON file structure in order to use the site.

equipo.parrafo: We are a multidisciplinary group of students and academics.

tecnologias.parrafo: We are a multidisciplinary group of students and academics.

menu.parrafo: To start using the viewer use the Open 'File' button and select a valid JSON format file...

visualizador.parrafo: To start using the viewer use the Open 'File' button and select a valid JSON format file for continue...
